        public <T> T invoke(Callable<T> c)
             throws Exception
        Wrap the given service call with the ConstantFlowRegulator protection logic.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The callable type I am wrapping
        Parameters:
        c - the Callable to attempt
        Returns:
        whatever c would return on success
        Throws:
        FlowRateExceededException - if the total requests per second through the flow regulator exceeds the configured value
        Exception - if c throws one during execution
